description: Have a better experience in WhatsApp with the SPIDEY-MD bot.

PREFIX.description: Choose your prefix for SPIDEY. To prevent errors and confusion, you must set a prefix.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter the phone numbers of the bot owners without '+' or spaces. Separate multiple numbers with commas. Example: 25478542xxx

OWNER_NAME.description: Add the owner's name for the bot.

BOTNAME.description: Enter a name for your bot.

SESSION.description: Paste the session ID that you received in WhatsApp after linking the bot. It's used for authentication.

AUTOVIEW_STATUS.description: Type 'true' if you want the bot to automatically read all status updates.

EVENTS.description: Choose whether to allow the bot to detect events in groups, such as promote, demote, remove, and add. If set to 'true', the bot will send welcome/goodbye messages and signal when somebody is promoted or demoted.

AUTOBIO.description: Type 'true' if you want the bot to auto-update its bio constantly.

ANTICALL_MSG.description: Add your anti-call message. This works when anti-call is enabled.

ANTICALL.description: Type 'true' if you want the bot to reject unnecessary calls.

GROUP_CONTROL.description: Type 'true' if you want the bot to kick users who send links or bad words in the group.

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: Type 'true' if you want the bot to automatically like status updates. This will only work if AUTOVIEW_STATUS is 'true'.

AUTOREAD.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to automatically blue-tick messages in private chats.

WA_PRESENCE.description: Set your WhatsApp presence status. Options: 'typing' (shows typing), 'recording' (shows recording), 'online' (always online), or leave blank to show the actual presence.

MODE.description: Set to 'private' if you don't want other people to use the bot, or 'public' if you want everyone to access it.
